articles.title: Increase in Dutch house prices among the highest in the EU - NL Times
articles.description: Not only are Dutch home prices among the highest in Europe, they are also increasing at one of the fastest rates in the EU. Housing prices in the Netherlands saw the largest increase in July since 2000, Statistic Netherlands (CBS) reported.
articles.content: Not only are Dutch home prices among the highest in Europe, they are also increasing at one of the fastest rates in the EU. Housing prices in the Netherlands saw the largest increase in July since 20… [+1786 chars]
